name: Livestock
description:
Explore a strange abandoned sci-fi world at your own pace, taking photos as you go and taking in the atmosphere 

Originally the game was to be a lot more ambitious, but due to covid and issues at home and issues with programming, the game is significantly shorter and less ambitious than it was set out to be - although the game is planned to be revisited in some form in the future

Controls: 
  • WSAD / Left Joystick = Move Character
  • Mouse / Right Joystick = Move Camera
  • Space bar / X or A = Jump
  • Shift / R2 = Sprint 
  • Ctrl / L2 = Slow 
  • V / L1 = Change View (1st or 3rd)
  • C / Square or X = Toggle collar light on or off 

(Game created by William Goodby & Zoe Parsons for 524AAD / 525AAD - Game Engines & Game Production)

Music (c) 
  • "Origins" by Lex Villena - https://www.freemusicarchive.org/music/lex-villena/single/origins (main menu music)
  • "Birds Eye View" by Daniel Birch - https://www.freemusicarchive.org/music/Daniel_Birch/colorfields-a-gallery-of-dan... (game level music)
Sound Effects (c) 
  • unfa's Menu Sounds by unfa - https://freesound.org/people/unfa/sounds/244266/ (menu ui sounds)
  • DSLR Click.wav by euanmj - https://freesound.org/people/euanmj/sounds/442875/ (screenshot sounds)

NOTE: Due to a massive error, the game is unable to be built, so we included the project files - the game is still playable but only in the unreal editor because of this issue: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DjalBGrOb0iAGJXdIQClVTilQYHxPjI0/view?usp=shari...
